评论概述: Not made for those with thick thighs
评论详情: This item is not made for women with thick thighs. Shorts are on a longer side hitting just above the knee. Ladies, if you have thick thighs, they will look like spandex.

评论概述: Material is thick and edges are unfinished
评论详情: The material in the photos is not at all the material of the item I received. It's thick and very scratchy on the inside; I won't be able to wear it without something else between my skin and that fabric. The hems around the legs are completely raw/unfinished. It looks like it was just cut off instead of properly hemmed. There is a seam, but it's nearly an inch above the raw edges and serves no point.  Regarding the size and fit: I'm 5-4, 270 and I ordered XXL. It fits alright but the legs are considerably smaller than the rest of the garment causing them to ride yup when I walk, and I only had the garment on for about five minutes. I do have a longer torso and have to have the straps fully extended and the crutch of the garment is in place like a normal pair of shorts, not baggy at all.

评论概述: Is leg hem edge meant to be cut?
评论详情: Not sure if I got a defective item or if the design is defective but the leg hem edge is cut. Why? Is this a fashion statement I'm unaware of? I zoomed in on the product photo but couldn't see the rough edge. I have to assume it's by design, which is why I give it just 2 stars. I liked the color brown and the fit was what I expected, comfortable and looks decent, and perfect wear for hot summer days. I wouldn't be embarrassed to wear it.

As someone who enjoys easy-breezy summer fashion, the Ekouaer sleeveless rompers have become a favorite go-to outfit for me. The loose fit and spaghetti straps make them incredibly comfortable to wear on hot days, offering a relaxed and stylish look. The added pockets are a practical feature, perfect for carrying essentials without needing a bag. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, ideal for staying cool while still looking put together. Whether I'm running errands or lounging at home, these rompers provide the perfect balance of comfort and style. Highly recommend for anyone who loves effortless summer outfits!
